contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 3, 1907 D Castleford Contest
Castleford Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
castleford-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Castleford, West Yorkshire Choice of Saffo, Gems of Haydn or Gems of Song. All played Saffo except Altofts who played Gems of Haydn. Promoted by Castleford Subscription Prize Band 4th prize divided between Carlton Temperance and Ossett Borough. March contest 1st Batley Old, 2nd Elland. 8 bands competed.
March 28, 2012, 5:36 p.m. July 3, 2015, 6:57 a.m.
1 Batley Old John Gladney Jnr
2 Rishworth and Ryburn William Heap
3 Elland Silver Band L. Calverley
4 Ossett Borough J. Brock
4 Carlton Temperance J. W. Stamp
Unknown Result Sowerby Bridge Subscription William Heap
Unknown Result Methley J. T. Marsden
Unknown Result Altofts and Normanton Band J. Kitchen
